Holt (worked under Valentine Parrish and Dabney Cosby)
creation: 1780; alteration: 1790; alteration: 1868; alteration: circa 1869; alteration: 1978
Shepherds Inn--Rented to Thomas Duckett Boyd 1803--Watsons Ordinary 1790--Visited by Lafayette for its arrak punch

2 Story Frame, Hall-Parlor, Paired Column Portico, 3 Bay, T-Plan, 3 Course American Bond, Bulkhead, Rectangular Banisters, Cut Nails, Sawn Lath, Mortise and Tenon Joinery, Summer Beam, L-Posts, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Circular Saw Marks, Winter Kitchen, Transom, 2 Leaf Door, 4 Panel Door, 6/6, Cemetery
Holt, Builder, worked under Valentine Parrish and Dabney Cosby--Ira Harris, Builder 1978
survey data: Virginia Road Traces--Work Projects Administration
